item.title: U.S. Stock Futures Slip
item.description: U.S. stock futures fell, with tech-focused Nasdaq-100 futures leading the declines.

item.title: Google's Government Foes Are Aiming Too High
item.description: A proposal to give up search and user data faces long odds but still raises the stakes for the company.

item.title: Marijuana Industry Could Stay in Limbo Under Trump
item.description: A hands-off policy on cannabis will be a bad outcome for a business already struggling with ambiguous laws.

item.title: This Year's College Aid Form Is Better, but Still Glitchy
item.description: The Education Department has been trying to fix the bugs that plagued the revamped Fafsa during its first attempt.

item.title: Brent Seen Around $80 a Barrel in 2024, Goldman Says
item.description: Goldman Sachs has forecast Brent crude to average roughly $80 barrels a day this year despite elevated geopolitical uncertainties and a modest supply ...
